scripts.deploy_contracts_rinkeby: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_rinkeby.js
scripts.deploy_contracts_mainnet: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.verify: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat verify --network mainnet 0x6dae8a922b66225de1728bd9e5f2b7a4bdd4699b 'Paintings of Forgotten Souls' 'SOULS' '0xaF69610ea9ddc95883f97a6a3171d52165b69B03' '0xec0ef86a3872829F3EC40de1b1b9Df54a3D4a4b3' '1632492000' '1634911200' '0x600a4446094C341693C415E6743567b9bfc8a4A8'
